summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the rejection of a KYC (Know Your Customer) case involving Karyna Shuliak. The email discusses the need for further verification of Karyna's income sources and her association with JSC Interiors LLC, as well as mentions of Jeffrey Epstein and others in relation to the KYC process.
